title: Rise of the Red Dragons
description: Nia finally thinks she has life figured out, treated to a fun time of magical hoverboarding on the slopes of Snowdonia in alternate Wales. When a trick on her magiboard goes wrong, she sets off ancient magics and finds herself part of a society no one ever knew existed. Used to screwing up everything she touches, will this latest mistake be the end of all?Also available in print.
author: N.M. Whittaker
